summary: The diff implements all 8 requirements from the BuildRequest: removes AIR rank projection from IntelligenceEngine (REQ-121), removes SleepTracker component entirely (REQ-122), updates FSI calculation to exclude sleep quality with redistributed weighting (REQ-123), removes sleepData field from backend UserData type and sleep-related data structures (REQ-124), removes sleep tracking React Query hooks from useQueries.ts (REQ-125), adds chapter name display to time block cards in FlexibleScheduleGrid (REQ-126), updates time block data model with chapter field and validation (REQ-127), and updates FocusStabilityIndex UI to reflect new formula without sleep references (REQ-128). The implementation includes proper migration logic for adding the chapter field to existing time slots.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module created with OldSleepEntry type and transformation logic for sleep data removal
hallucinated_features.reason: The migration.mo file includes migration logic for removing sleep data from the backend, but the BuildRequest did not request migration code or data transformation utilities. REQ-124 only specified removing sleep endpoints, data models, and the sleepData field - not creating migration infrastructure.
